name: Cool Herders
description:
A multiplayer puzzle game that could be described as a cross between the multiplayer modes of Super Bomberman and Chu Chu Rocket. In the game, you must collect more sheep than your opponent. You can use your magic staff to stun your opponent or the sheep. You can collect powerups such as shoes for faster movement, and lightning for farther blasts from your staff.

There is also a single player puzzle mode, which has you fighting non-player-controlled characters. Some of the single player stages feature timed elements, such as finding an item in a block within a specific amount of time, or collecting as many sheep as possible within the allotted time.
